channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:25 Driven the alarm to Donetsk region.Creat by further messages.

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirovskaya territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_.
